title: Notch将做客CBS晚间娱乐节目《深夜秀》
author: seraph0012
txt_content:
Markus Persson, the creator of Minecraft, one of the most popular video games in the world, will make his first talk show appearance ever on The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson Thursday, Nov. 7 (12:37-1:37 AM, ET/PT) on the CBS Television Network. 

马库斯·泊松，时下最受欢迎的游戏之一Minecraft的创造者，将于11月7日周四凌晨12:37-1:37（太平洋时间）做客美国CBS晚间娱乐节目《深夜秀》。

Markus Persson is a Swedish video game programmer and designer who gained global popularity for creating Minecraft, a first-person sandbox video game that has sold in excess of 30 million copies across all platforms. Persson is also the founder of the video game company Mojang. He is known to his worldwide fan base by his internet handle "Notch."

马库斯·泊松是一个瑞典游戏开发者和游戏设计师。他制作的游戏Minecraft已经在各个平台发售了超过3000万份。他同时也是游戏公司Mojang的创始人。玩家和fans更习惯称呼他为Notch（他的网名）。

消息来源：broadwayworld
